name: JobSearch
0:
”Alexa, open Job Search”
”I want a chef Job”
”i am searching for a accountant job”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: job search
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Find jobs best suited to you, anywhere using your Alexa.
 

Answer questions such as profession, salary, and location and then Job Search will find all the best jobs for you. At the end of your search, Alexa can text you the results and details of your jobs, all you need to do is read out your phone number when she asks for it.
 

Just say: “Alexa, open Job Search”, to get started!


Happy job hunting!
